title: Loving You Dearly - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Persistent Love Interests   Reincarnation   Second Chance
author: 狂摇小尾巴
description:
After returning to the second year of high school, Ning Zhen vowed to do three things well.

Try to accept her stepmother and stepbrother.

Keep dancing.

Stay away from Lu Zhi.

The first two things she did well, but the third…

One day, the lights in the classroom were turned off with a snap. In the dark, a youngster held her wrist firmly and pulled her into his arms.

“Do you disdain Laozi for being poor, eh?”>
